Table.ten: 2. Báo cáo sử dụng thuốc theo khoa
1. Báo cáo sử dụng thuốc BN(Phòng Lưu)

Table.sql: select bn.hoten,bn.mabn,bn.namsinh,xa.tenpxa ,quan.tenquan , tinh.tentt, to_char(ba.ngay,'dd/mm/yyyy') as ngayvv,to_char(xv.ngay,'dd/mm/yyyy') as ngayrv, xv.chandoan,xv.ketqua,xv.maicd from medibv.benhandt ba,medibv.btdbn bn, medibv.btdpxa xa,medibv.btdquan quan,medibv.btdtt tinh,medibv.xuatvien xv where xv.mabn=bn.mabn and bn.maphuongxa=xa.maphuongxa and bn.maqu=quan.maqu and bn.matt=tinh.matt and bn.mabn=ba.mabn and xv.maicd in ('X48','X49','X68','X69') and to_date(to_char(xv.ngay,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy') between to_date(':v_tn','dd/mm/yyyy') and to_date(':v_dn','dd/mm/yyyy')
Table.captionfield: họ tên,Tuổi, xã ,quận,tỉnh,ngày vào viện, ngày ra viện,chẩn đoán,kết quả,maicd

Table.sql: select makp,makho,stt,mabd,tondau,slnhap,slxuat from medibvmmyy.d_tutrucct
Table.captionfield: makp,makho,stt,mabd,tondau,slnhap,slxuat

Table.sql: select id,stt,sttt,makho,mabd,soluong,sttduyet from medibvmmyy.d_xuatsdct
Table.captionfield: id,stt,sttt,makho,mabd,soluong,sttduyet

Table.sql: select id,stt,makho,mabd,slyeucau,slthuc from medibvmmyy.d_xtutrucct
Table.captionfield: id,stt,makho,mabd,slyeucau,slthuc

Table.sql: select id,stt,ngay,makho,mabd,slyeucau,slthuc from medibvmmyy.d_hoantract
Table.captionfield: id,stt,ngay,makho,mabd,slyeucau,slthuc

Table.sql: select a.id,b.ten,b.dang,a.stt,a.makho,a.mabd,sum(a.slyeucau) as slyeucau,sum(a.slthuc) as soluong from medibvmmyy.d_dutruct a,medibv.d_dmbd b where a.mabd=b.id group by a.id,b.ten,b.dang,a.stt,a.makho,a.mabd
Table.captionfield: id,ten,dang,stt,makho,mabd,slyeucau,soluong

Table.sql: select bn.mabn,bn.hoten,xa.tenpxa ,quan.tenquan,tinh.tentt,ba.chandoan,bd.ten,bd.dang,sum(tienthuoc.soluong) soluong,nhom.ten,dkp.ten,dkp.ma,to_char(tienthuoc.ngay,'dd/mm/yyyy') as ngaythuoc from medibv.benhandt ba,medibv.btdbn bn, medibv.btdpxa xa,medibv.btdquan quan,medibv.btdtt tinh,medibv.d_dmbd bd,medibv.d_dmnhom nhom,medibv0907.d_tienthuoc tienthuoc,medibv.d_duockp dkp where bn.maphuongxa=xa.maphuongxa and bn.maqu=quan.maqu and bn.matt=tinh.matt and bn.mabn=ba.mabn and bn.mabn=tienthuoc.mabn and tienthuoc.mabd=bd.id and tienthuoc.makp=dkp.ma and bd.manhom=nhom.id and dkp.ma=12 and nhom.id=1 and to_date(to_char(tienthuoc.ngay,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy') between to_date(':v_tn','dd/mm/yyyy') and to_date(':v_dn','dd/mm/yyyy') group by bn.mabn,bn.hoten,xa.tenpxa ,quan.tenquan,tinh.tentt,ba.chandoan,bd.ten,bd.dang,nhom.ten,dkp.ten,dkp.ma,ngaythuoc
Table.captionfield: Mã Bn, Họ Tên, chẩn đoán, Tên thuốc,Đvt, Số lượng

Table.sql: select bn.mabn,bn.hoten,xa.tenpxa ,quan.tenquan,tinh.tentt,ba.chandoan,bd.ten,bd.dang,sum(tienthuoc.soluong) soluong,nhom.ten,dkp.ten,dkp.ma,to_char(tienthuoc.ngay,'dd/mm/yyyy') as ngaythuoc from medibv.benhandt ba,medibv.btdbn bn, medibv.btdpxa xa,medibv.btdquan quan,medibv.btdtt tinh,medibv.d_dmbd bd,medibv.d_dmnhom nhom,medibvmmyy.d_tienthuoc tienthuoc,medibv.d_duockp dkp where bn.maphuongxa=xa.maphuongxa and bn.maqu=quan.maqu and bn.matt=tinh.matt and bn.mabn=ba.mabn and bn.mabn=tienthuoc.mabn and tienthuoc.mabd=bd.id and tienthuoc.makp=dkp.ma and bd.manhom=nhom.id and dkp.ma=12 and nhom.id=4 and to_date(to_char(tienthuoc.ngay,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy') between to_date(':v_tn','dd/mm/yyyy') and to_date(':v_dn','dd/mm/yyyy') group by bn.mabn,bn.hoten,xa.tenpxa ,quan.tenquan,tinh.tentt,ba.chandoan,bd.ten,bd.dang,nhom.ten,dkp.ten,dkp.ma,ngaythuoc
Table.captionfield: Mã Bn, Họ Tên, chẩn đoán, Tên thuốc,Đvt, Số lượng,ngaythuoc

Table.sql: select bn.hoten,bn.mabn,bn.namsinh,xa.tenpxa ,quan.tenquan , tinh.tentt, to_char(ba.ngay,'dd/mm/yyyy') as ngay_vv,to_char(xv.ngay,'dd/mm/yyyy') as ngay_rv, xv.chandoan,xv.maicd from medibv.benhandt ba,medibv.btdbn bn, medibv.btdpxa xa,medibv.btdquan quan,medibv.btdtt tinh,medibv.xuatvien xv where xv.mabn=bn.mabn and bn.maphuongxa=xa.maphuongxa and bn.maqu=quan.maqu and bn.matt=tinh.matt and bn.mabn=ba.mabn and xv.maicd in ('A91','A96','A96.0','A96.1','A96.8','A96.9','A98','A98.0','A98.1','A98.5','A98.8','A99') and to_date(to_char(xv.ngay,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy') between to_date(':v_tn','dd/mm/yyyy') and to_date(':v_dn','dd/mm/yyyy')
Table.captionfield: Họ tên, Tuổi, Xã, Quận,Tỉnh,Ngày vào,Ngày ra,Chẩn đoán

Table.sql: select bn.hoten,bn.mabn,bn.namsinh,xa.tenpxa ,quan.tenquan , tinh.tentt, to_char(ba.ngay,'dd/mm/yyyy') as ngay_vv,to_char(xv.ngay,'dd/mm/yyyy') as ngay_rv, xv.chandoan,xv.maicd from medibv.benhandt ba,medibv.btdbn bn, medibv.btdpxa xa,medibv.btdquan quan,medibv.btdtt tinh,medibv.xuatvien xv where xv.mabn=bn.mabn and bn.maphuongxa=xa.maphuongxa and bn.maqu=quan.maqu and bn.matt=tinh.matt and bn.mabn=ba.mabn and xv.maicd in ('B50','B50.0','B50.8','B50.9','B51','B51.8','B51.9','B52','B52.0','B52.8','B52.9','B53','B53.0','B53.1','B53.8','B54','P37.3','P37.4') and to_date(to_char(xv.ngay,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy') between to_date(':v_tn','dd/mm/yyyy') and to_date(':v_dn','dd/mm/yyyy') order by bn.hoten
Table.captionfield: Mã BN,Họ tên, Tuổi, Xã, Quận,Tỉnh,Chẩn đoán,maicd,maicd,Ngày vào viện,Ngày ra viện

Table.sql: select bn.hoten,bn.mabn,bn.namsinh,xa.tenpxa ,quan.tenquan ,tinh.tentt, to_char(ba.ngay,'dd/mm/yyyy') as ngay_vv,to_char(xv.ngay,'dd/mm/yyyy') as ngay_rv, xv.chandoan,xv.maicd,nhom.nhom from medibv.benhandt ba,medibv.btdbn bn, medibv.btdpxa xa,medibv.btdquan quan,medibv.btdtt tinh,medibv.xuatvien xv,medibv.icd_chapter ct,medibv.icd_nhom nhom,medibv.icd10 icd where xv.mabn=bn.mabn and bn.maphuongxa=xa.maphuongxa and bn.maqu=quan.maqu and bn.matt=tinh.matt and bn.mabn=ba.mabn and icd.cicd10=xv.maicd and ct.id_chapter=nhom.id_chapter and nhom.id_nhom=icd.id_nhom and ct.id_chapter=1 and icd.cicd10 in ('A00','A00.0','A00.1','A00.9','A01','A01.0','A01.1','A01.2','A06.0','A06.2','M02.1','A03.4','K58.0','K58.9','K59.1','K90.1','A83','A83.8','A83.9','A84','A84.0','A84.8','A84.9','A85','A85.2','A85.8','A86','A90','B17','B17.8','B18','B17.8','B18.0','B18.1','B18.8','B18.9','B19','B19.0','B19.9','O98.4','P35.3','A82','A82.0','A82.1','B01.2','G53.0','A36','A36.0','A36.1','A36.2','A36.3','A36.8','A36.9','A37','A37.0','A37.1','A37.8','A37.9','A33','A35','A80','A80.4','A80.9','B91','B05','B05.8','B05.9','B26','B26.8','B26.9','J10','J10','J10.0','J10.1','J10.8','J11','J11.0','J11.1','J11.8','A20','A20.0','A20.1','A20.2','A22','A22.0','A22.1','A22.2','A22.7','A22.8','A22.9','A27','A27.0','A27.8','A27.9','B20','B20.0','B20.1','B20.2','B20.3','B20.4','B20.5','B20.6','B20.7','B20.8','B20.9','B20.10','B21','B21.3','B21.7','B21.9','B22','B22.0','B22.1','B22.2','B22.7','B23','B23.0','B23.1','B23.2','B23.8','B24') and to_date(to_char(xv.ngay,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy') between to_date(':v_tn','dd/mm/yyyy') and to_date(':v_dn','dd/mm/yyyy') order by xv.chandoan
Table.captionfield: Họ tên, Tuổi, Xã, Quận,Tỉnh,Chẩn đoán,maicd

Table.ten: I. BÁO CÁO TÌNH HÌNH BỆNH TẬT

Table.sql: select bn.hoten,bn.mabn,bn.namsinh,xa.tenpxa ,quan.tenquan , tinh.tentt, to_char(ba.ngay,'dd/mm/yyyy') as ngay_vv,to_char(xv.ngay,'dd/mm/yyyy') as ngay_rv, xv.chandoan,xv.maicd from medibv.benhandt ba,medibv.btdbn bn, medibv.btdpxa xa,medibv.btdquan quan,medibv.btdtt tinh,medibv.xuatvien xv where xv.mabn=bn.mabn and bn.maphuongxa=xa.maphuongxa and bn.maqu=quan.maqu and bn.matt=tinh.matt and bn.mabn=ba.mabn and xv.maicd in ('B50','B50.0','B50.8','B50.9','B51','B51.8','B51.9','B52','B52.0','B52.8','B52.9','B53','B53.0','B53.1','B53.8','B54','P37.3','P37.4') and to_date(to_char(xv.ngay,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy') between to_date(':v_tn','dd/mm/yyyy') and to_date(':v_dn','dd/mm/yyyy') order by bn.hoten
Table.captionfield: Họ tên, Tuổi, Xã, Quận,Tỉnh,Chẩn đoán,maicd

Table.sql: select bn.hoten,bn.mabn,bn.namsinh,xa.tenpxa ,quan.tenquan , tinh.tentt,to_char(ba.ngay,'dd/mm/yyyy') as ngayvv,to_char(xv.ngay,'dd/mm/yyyy') as ngayrv,xv.chandoan,xv.ketqua,xv.maicd from medibv.benhandt ba,medibv.btdbn bn, medibv.btdpxa xa,medibv.btdquan quan,medibv.btdtt tinh,medibv.xuatvien xv where xv.mabn=bn.mabn and bn.maphuongxa=xa.maphuongxa and bn.maqu=quan.maqu and bn.matt=tinh.matt and bn.mabn=ba.mabn and xv.maicd in ('X48','X49','X68','X69') and to_date(to_char(xv.ngay,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy') between to_date(':v_tn','dd/mm/yyyy') and to_date(':v_dn','dd/mm/yyyy')
Table.captionfield: họ tên,Tuổi, xã ,quận,tỉnh,ngày vào viện, ngày ra viện,Ngày tử vong,chẩn đoán,kết quả,maicd

Table.sql: select bn.hoten,bn.mabn,bn.namsinh,xa.tenpxa ,quan.tenquan ,tinh.tentt, to_char(ba.ngay,'dd/mm/yyyy') as ngay_vv,to_char(xv.ngay,'dd/mm/yyyy') as ngay_rv, xv.chandoan,xv.maicd,nhom.nhom from medibv.benhandt ba,medibv.btdbn bn, medibv.btdpxa xa,medibv.btdquan quan,medibv.btdtt tinh,medibv.xuatvien xv,medibv.icd_chapter ct,medibv.icd_nhom nhom,medibv.icd10 icd where xv.mabn=bn.mabn and bn.maphuongxa=xa.maphuongxa and bn.maqu=quan.maqu and bn.matt=tinh.matt and bn.mabn=ba.mabn and icd.cicd10=xv.maicd and ct.id_chapter=nhom.id_chapter and nhom.id_nhom=icd.id_nhom and ct.id_chapter=1 and icd.cicd10 in ('A00','A00.0','A00.1','A00.9','A01','A01.0','A01.1','A01.2','A06.0','A06.2','M02.1','A03.4','K58.0','K58.9','K59.1','K90.1','A83','A83.8','A83.9','A84','A84.0','A84.8','A84.9','A85','A85.2','A85.8','A86','A90','B17','B17.8','B18','B17.8','B18.0','B18.1','B18.8','B18.9','B19','B19.0','B19.9','O98.4','P35.3','A82','A82.0','A82.1','B01.2','G53.0','A36','A36.0','A36.1','A36.2','A36.3','A36.8','A36.9','A37','A37.0','A37.1','A37.8','A37.9','A33','A35','A80','A80.4','A80.9','B91','B05','B05.8','B05.9','B26','B26.8','B26.9','J10','J10','J10.0','J10.1','J10.8','J11','J11.0','J11.1','J11.8','A20','A20.0','A20.1','A20.2','A22','A22.0','A22.1','A22.2','A22.7','A22.8','A22.9','A27','A27.0','A27.8','A27.9','B20','B20.0','B20.1','B20.2','B20.3','B20.4','B20.5','B20.6','B20.7','B20.8','B20.9','B20.10','B21','B21.3','B21.7','B21.9','B22','B22.0','B22.1','B22.2','B22.7','B23','B23.0','B23.1','B23.2','B23.8','B24') and to_date(to_char(xv.ngay,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy') between to_date(':v_tn','dd/mm/yyyy') and to_date(':v_dn','dd/mm/yyyy') order by xv.chandoan
Table.captionfield: Họ tên, Tuổi, Xã, Quận,Tỉnh,Chẩn đoán,maicd

Table.sql: select bn.hoten,bn.mabn,bn.namsinh,xa.tenpxa ,quan.tenquan , tinh.tentt,to_char(ba.ngay,'dd/mm/yyyy') as ngayvv,to_char(xv.ngay,'dd/mm/yyyy') as ngayrv,xv.chandoan,xv.ketqua,xv.maicd from medibv.benhandt ba,medibv.btdbn bn, medibv.btdpxa xa,medibv.btdquan quan,medibv.btdtt tinh,medibv.xuatvien xv where xv.mabn=bn.mabn and bn.maphuongxa=xa.maphuongxa and bn.maqu=quan.maqu and bn.matt=tinh.matt and bn.mabn=ba.mabn and xv.maicd in ('A91','A96','A96.0','A96.1','A96.8','A96.9','A98','A98.0','A98.1','A98.5','A98.8','A99') and to_date(to_char(xv.ngay,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy') between to_date(':v_tn','dd/mm/yyyy') and to_date(':v_dn','dd/mm/yyyy')
Table.captionfield: Họ tên, Tuổi, Xã, Quận,Tỉnh,Ngày vào viện, Ngày ra viện,Chẩn đoán,maicd

Table.ten: BN sử dụng thuốc (Gây nghiện,Hướng Thần)
Table.sql:
select bn.mabn,bn.hoten,xa.tenpxa ,ba.chandoan,quan.tenquan,tinh.tentt,bd.ten,bd.dang,sum(tienthuoc.soluong) soluong,nhom.ten
from medibv.benhandt ba,medibv.btdbn bn, medibv.btdpxa xa,medibv.btdquan quan,medibv.btdtt tinh,medibv.d_dmbd bd,medibv.d_dmnhom nhom,medibvmmyy.d_tienthuoc tienthuoc
where bn.maphuongxa=xa.maphuongxa and bn.maqu=quan.maqu and bn.matt=tinh.matt and bn.mabn=tienthuoc.mabn and tienthuoc.mabd in (select id from medibv.d_dmbd where manhom in (select id from medibv.d_dmnhom where id in (1,4))) and tienthuoc.mabd=bd.id and bd.manhom=nhom.id and ba.mavaovien=tienthuoc.mavaovien and bd.manhom=nhom.id group by bn.mabn,bn.hoten,xa.tenpxa,ba.chandoan,quan.tenquan,tinh.tentt,bd.ten,bd.dang,nhom.ten
Table.captionfield: Mã Bn, Họ Tên,Tên thuốc,Đvt, Số lượng,chandoan

Table.ten: II. BÁO CÁO THUỐC GÂY NGHIỆN
III. BÁO CÁO THUỐC HƯỚNG THẦN

Table.sql: select bhytthuoc.mabd,dmbd.ma,dmbd.ten,dmbd.hamluong,dmbd.dang,dmbd.manhom,dmbd.mahang,sum(bhytthuoc.soluong) as soluong,theodoi.giamua,bhytkb.makp,btdkpbv.tenkp from medibvmmyy.bhytthuoc bhytthuoc,medibv.d_dmbd dmbd,medibvmmyy.bhytkb bhytkb,medibv.btdkp_bv btdkpbv,medibvmmyy.d_theodoi theodoi where bhytthuoc.id=bhytkb.id and bhytthuoc.mabd=dmbd.id and btdkpbv.makp=bhytkb.makp and theodoi.id=bhytthuoc.sttt and tenkp='Pk - Nhi 15' group by bhytthuoc.mabd,dmbd.ma,dmbd.ten,dmbd.hamluong,dmbd.dang,dmbd.manhom,dmbd.mahang,theodoi.giamua,bhytkb.makp,btdkpbv.tenkp
Table.captionfield: mabd , mathuoc ,ten ,hamluong , dang , soluong , giamua , tenkp

Table.sql: select danhmuc.ten,danhmuc.dang,sum(toact.soluong)as soluong,toall.makp,btdkp.tenkp from medibvmmyy.d_toathuocct toact,medibv.d_dmthuoc danhmuc,medibvmmyy.d_toathuocll toall,medibv.btdkp_bv btdkp where toact.mabd=danhmuc.id and toact.id=toall.id and toall.makp=btdkp.makp and tenkp='Pk - Nhi 15' group by danhmuc.ten,danhmuc.dang,toall.makp,btdkp.tenkp

Table.ten: V. BC Phòng Khám Sử Dụng Thuốc

Table.sql: select xuatll.mabn,btdbn.hoten,dtct.mabd,dmbd.ten,dmbd.hamluong,dmbd.dang,dtct.slyeucau,dtct.slthuc from medibvmmyy.d_dutruct dtct,medibvmmyy.d_xuatsdll xuatll,medibv.d_dmbd dmbd,medibv.btdbn btdbn where dtct.id=xuatll.idduyet and dtct.id in (select idduyet from medibvmmyy.d_xuatsdll where id in (select id from medibvmmyy.d_xuatsdll where loai=1 and phieu=2 and makp=1 and to_char(ngayylenh,'dd/mm/yyyy')='04/03/2008')) and slthuc=0 and dmbd.id=dtct.mabd and btdbn.mabn=xuatll.mabn

select xuatll.mabn,btdbn.hoten,dtct.mabd,dmbd.ten,dmbd.hamluong,dmbd.dang,dtct.slyeucau,dtct.slthuc from medibvmmyy.d_dutruct dtct,medibvmmyy.d_xuatsdll xuatll,medibv.d_dmbd dmbd,medibv.btdbn btdbn where dtct.id=xuatll.idduyet and dtct.id in (select idduyet from medibvmmyy.d_xuatsdll where id in (select id from medibvmmyy.d_xuatsdll where loai=1 and phieu=11 and makp=1 and to_char(ngayylenh,'dd/mm/yyyy')='04/03/2008')) and slthuc=0 and dmbd.id=dtct.mabd and btdbn.mabn=xuatll.mabn

select xuatll.mabn,btdbn.hoten,dtct.mabd,dmbd.ten,dmbd.hamluong,dmbd.dang,dtct.slyeucau,dtct.slthuc from medibvmmyy.d_dutruct dtct,medibvmmyy.d_xuatsdll xuatll,medibv.d_dmbd dmbd,medibv.btdbn btdbn where dtct.id=xuatll.idduyet and dtct.id in (select idduyet from medibvmmyy.d_xuatsdll where id in (select id from medibvmmyy.d_xuatsdll where loai=1 and phieu=12 and makp=1 and to_char(ngayylenh,'dd/mm/yyyy')='04/03/2008')) and slthuc=0 and dmbd.id=dtct.mabd and btdbn.mabn=xuatll.mabn

select xuatll.mabn,btdbn.hoten,dtct.mabd,dmbd.ten,dmbd.hamluong,dmbd.dang,dtct.slyeucau,dtct.slthuc from medibvmmyy.d_dutruct dtct,medibvmmyy.d_xuatsdll xuatll,medibv.d_dmbd dmbd,medibv.btdbn btdbn where dtct.id=xuatll.idduyet and dtct.id in (select idduyet from medibvmmyy.d_xuatsdll where id in (select id from medibvmmyy.d_xuatsdll where loai=1 and phieu=17 and makp=1 and to_char(ngayylenh,'dd/mm/yyyy')='04/03/2008')) and slthuc=0 and dmbd.id=dtct.mabd and btdbn.mabn=xuatll.mabn

Table.ten: VI. Thuốc duyệt bị treo (Goi vi tính xem dùm: 0968720884)

Table.sql: select xuatll.mabn,btdbn.hoten,dtct.mabd,dmbd.ten,dmbd.hamluong,dmbd.dang,dtct.slyeucau,dtct.slthuc from medibvmmyy.d_dutruct dtct,medibvmmyy.d_xuatsdll xuatll,medibv.d_dmbd dmbd,medibv.btdbn btdbn where dtct.id=xuatll.idduyet and dtct.id in (select idduyet from medibvmmyy.d_xuatsdll where id in (select id from medibvmmyy.d_xuatsdll where loai=1 and phieu=3 and makp=7 and to_char(ngayylenh,'dd/mm/yyyy')='30/03/2008')) and slthuc=0 and dmbd.id=dtct.mabd and btdbn.mabn=xuatll.mabn
select * from medibv0408.pttt where makp=11 and tinhhinh=2
Table.captionfield: mabn

Table.sql: select xuatll.mabn,btdbn.hoten,dtct.mabd,dmbd.ten,dmbd.hamluong,dmbd.dang,dtct.slyeucau,dtct.slthuc from medibvmmyy.d_dutruct dtct,medibvmmyy.d_xuatsdll xuatll,medibv.d_dmbd dmbd,medibv.btdbn btdbn where dtct.id=xuatll.idduyet and dtct.id in (select idduyet from medibvmmyy.d_xuatsdll where id in (select id from medibvmmyy.d_xuatsdll where loai=1 and phieu=1 and makp='09' and to_char(ngayylenh,'dd/mm/yyyy')='25/04/2008')) and slthuc=0 and dmbd.id=dtct.mabd and btdbn.mabn=xuatll.mabn

select danhmuc.ten,danhmuc.dang,sum(toact.soluong)as soluong,toall.makp,btdkp.tenkp from medibvmmyy.d_toathuocct toact,medibv.d_dmthuoc danhmuc,medibvmmyy.d_toathuocll toall,medibv.btdkp_bv btdkp where toact.mabd=danhmuc.id and toact.id=toall.id and toall.makp=btdkp.makp and tenkp='Pk - Răng Hàm Mặt' group by danhmuc.ten,danhmuc.dang,toall.makp,btdkp.tenkp
Table.captionfield: ten,dang,soluong,makp,tenkp

Table.sql: select bhytthuoc.mabd,dmbd.ma,dmbd.ten,dmbd.hamluong,dmbd.dang,dmbd.manhom,dmbd.mahang,sum(bhytthuoc.soluong) as soluong,theodoi.giamua,bhytkb.makp,btdkpbv.tenkp from medibvmmyy.bhytthuoc bhytthuoc,medibv.d_dmbd dmbd,medibvmmyy.bhytkb bhytkb,medibv.btdkp_bv btdkpbv,medibvmmyy.d_theodoi theodoi where bhytthuoc.id=bhytkb.id and bhytthuoc.mabd=dmbd.id and btdkpbv.makp=bhytkb.makp and theodoi.id=bhytthuoc.sttt and tenkp='Pk - Răng Hàm Mặt' group by bhytthuoc.mabd,dmbd.ma,dmbd.ten,dmbd.hamluong,dmbd.dang,dmbd.manhom,dmbd.mahang,theodoi.giamua,bhytkb.makp,btdkpbv.tenkp
Table.captionfield: mabd,ma,ten,hamluong,dang,soluong,giamua,tenkp

Table.sql: select dm.ma as MaThuoc,dm.ten as tenthuoc,dm.hamluong,dm.dang,td.giamua as dongia,ttt.tondau,ttt.slnhap,ttt.slxuat,nhom.ten tennhom,ttt.mabd as MaBDuoc from medibvmmyy.d_tutrucct ttt, medibv.d_dmbd dm,medibv.d_dmnhom nhom,medibvmmyy.d_theodoi td where ttt.mabd in (select id from medibv.d_dmbd) and ttt.mabd = dm.id and dm.manhom=nhom.id and td.id= ttt.stt

select dm.ma as MaThuoc,dm.ten as tenthuoc,dm.hamluong,dm.dang,sum(td.giamua) as dongia,ttt.tondau,ttt.slnhap,ttt.slxuat,nhom.ten tennhom,ttt.mabd as MaBDuoc from medibvmmyy.d_tutrucct ttt, medibv.d_dmbd dm,medibv.d_dmnhom nhom,medibvmmyy.d_theodoi td where ttt.mabd in (select id from medibv.d_dmbd) and ttt.mabd = dm.id and dm.manhom=nhom.id and td.id= ttt.stt and ttt.makp=2 group dm.ma,dm.ten,dm.hamluong,dm.dang,ttt.tondau,ttt.slnhap,ttt.slxuat,nhom.ten tennhom,ttt.mabd
Table.captionfield: Mã thuốc, Tên,Tên thuốc, Hàm lượng,Đơn vị tính,Đơn giá,Tồn đầu, SLnhập,Slxuất,Tên nhóm,MãBD

Table.sql: select dm.ma as MaThuoc,dm.ten as tenthuoc,dm.hamluong,dm.dang,td.giamua as dongia,ttt.tondau,ttt.slnhap,ttt.slxuat,nhom.ten tennhom,ttt.mabd as MaBDuoc from medibvmmyy.d_tutrucct ttt, medibv.d_dmbd dm,medibv.d_dmnhom nhom,medibvmmyy.d_theodoi td where ttt.mabd in (select id from medibv.d_dmbd) and ttt.mabd = dm.id and dm.manhom=nhom.id and td.id= ttt.stt and ttt.makp=3

select dm.ma as MaThuoc,dm.ten as tenthuoc,dm.hamluong,dm.dang,td.giamua as dongia,ttt.tondau,ttt.slnhap,ttt.slxuat,nhom.ten tennhom,ttt.mabd as MaBDuoc from medibvmmyy.d_tutrucct ttt, medibv.d_dmbd dm,medibv.d_dmnhom nhom,medibvmmyy.d_theodoi td where ttt.mabd in (select id from medibv.d_dmbd) and ttt.mabd = dm.id and dm.manhom=nhom.id and td.id= ttt.stt and ttt.makp=4

select dm.ma as MaThuoc,dm.ten as tenthuoc,dm.hamluong,dm.dang,td.giamua as dongia,ttt.tondau,ttt.slnhap,ttt.slxuat,nhom.ten tennhom,ttt.mabd as MaBDuoc from medibvmmyy.d_tutrucct ttt, medibv.d_dmbd dm,medibv.d_dmnhom nhom,medibvmmyy.d_theodoi td where ttt.mabd in (select id from medibv.d_dmbd) and ttt.mabd = dm.id and dm.manhom=nhom.id and td.id= ttt.stt and ttt.makp=5

select dm.ma as MaThuoc,dm.ten as tenthuoc,dm.hamluong,dm.dang,td.giamua as dongia,ttt.tondau,ttt.slnhap,ttt.slxuat,nhom.ten tennhom,ttt.mabd as MaBDuoc from medibvmmyy.d_tutrucct ttt, medibv.d_dmbd dm,medibv.d_dmnhom nhom,medibvmmyy.d_theodoi td where ttt.mabd in (select id from medibv.d_dmbd) and ttt.mabd = dm.id and dm.manhom=nhom.id and td.id= ttt.stt and ttt.makp=6

select dm.ma as MaThuoc,dm.ten as tenthuoc,dm.hamluong,dm.dang,td.giamua as dongia,ttt.tondau,ttt.slnhap,ttt.slxuat,nhom.ten tennhom,ttt.mabd as MaBDuoc from medibvmmyy.d_tutrucct ttt, medibv.d_dmbd dm,medibv.d_dmnhom nhom,medibvmmyy.d_theodoi td where ttt.mabd in (select id from medibv.d_dmbd) and ttt.mabd = dm.id and dm.manhom=nhom.id and td.id= ttt.stt and ttt.makp=7

select dm.ma as MaThuoc,dm.ten as tenthuoc,dm.hamluong,dm.dang,td.giamua as dongia,ttt.tondau,ttt.slnhap,ttt.slxuat,nhom.ten tennhom,ttt.mabd as MaBDuoc from medibvmmyy.d_tutrucct ttt, medibv.d_dmbd dm,medibv.d_dmnhom nhom,medibvmmyy.d_theodoi td where ttt.mabd in (select id from medibv.d_dmbd) and ttt.mabd = dm.id and dm.manhom=nhom.id and td.id= ttt.stt and ttt.makp=8 and dm.nhom=1

Table.ten: V. BÁO CÁO CƠ SỐ TỦ TRỰC

Table.sql: select btdbn.mabn, btdbn.hoten,icd.maicd,icd.chandoan,dm.ma as MaThuoc,dm.ten as tenthuoc,dm.hamluong,dm.dang,dm.dongia,sum(tt.soluong) as soluong,nhom.ten tennhom,tt.mabd as MaBDuoc, to_char(tt.ngay,'dd/mm/yyyy') ngay from medibvmmyy.d_tienthuoc tt, medibv.d_dmbd dm,medibv.btdbn btdbn,medibv.benhandt icd,medibv.d_dmnhom nhom where tt.mabd in (select id from medibv.d_dmbd where manhom in (select id from medibv.d_dmnhom where id not in (1,2))) and tt.mabd = dm.id and btdbn.mabn=tt.mabn and icd.mavaovien=tt.mavaovien and tt.maql=icd.maql and dm.manhom=nhom.id and tt.makp=2 group by btdbn.mabn, btdbn.hoten,icd.maicd,icd.chandoan,dm.ma,dm.ten,dm.hamluong,dm.dang,dm.dongia,nhom.ten,tt.mabd, to_char(tt.ngay,'dd/mm/yyyy')

select btdbn.mabn, btdbn.hoten,icd.maicd,icd.chandoan,dm.ma as MaThuoc,dm.ten as tenthuoc,dm.hamluong,dm.dang,dm.dongia,sum(tt.soluong) as soluong,nhom.ten tennhom,tt.mabd as MaBDuoc, to_char(tt.ngay,'dd/mm/yyyy') ngay from medibvmmyy.d_tienthuoc tt, medibv.d_dmbd dm,medibv.btdbn btdbn,medibv.benhandt icd,medibv.d_dmnhom nhom where tt.mabd in (select id from medibv.d_dmbd where manhom in (select id from medibv.d_dmnhom where id not in (1,2))) and tt.mabd = dm.id and btdbn.mabn=tt.mabn and icd.mavaovien=tt.mavaovien and tt.maql=icd.maql and dm.manhom=nhom.id and tt.makp=3 group by btdbn.mabn, btdbn.hoten,icd.maicd,icd.chandoan,dm.ma,dm.ten,dm.hamluong,dm.dang,dm.dongia,nhom.ten,tt.mabd, to_char(tt.ngay,'dd/mm/yyyy')

select btdbn.mabn, btdbn.hoten,icd.maicd,icd.chandoan,dm.ma as MaThuoc,dm.ten as tenthuoc,dm.hamluong,dm.dang,dm.dongia,sum(tt.soluong) as soluong,nhom.ten tennhom,tt.mabd as MaBDuoc, to_char(tt.ngay,'dd/mm/yyyy') ngay from medibvmmyy.d_tienthuoc tt, medibv.d_dmbd dm,medibv.btdbn btdbn,medibv.benhandt icd,medibv.d_dmnhom nhom where tt.mabd in (select id from medibv.d_dmbd where manhom in (select id from medibv.d_dmnhom where id not in (1,2))) and tt.mabd = dm.id and btdbn.mabn=tt.mabn and icd.mavaovien=tt.mavaovien and tt.maql=icd.maql and dm.manhom=nhom.id and tt.makp=4 group by btdbn.mabn, btdbn.hoten,icd.maicd,icd.chandoan,dm.ma,dm.ten,dm.hamluong,dm.dang,dm.dongia,nhom.ten,tt.mabd, to_char(tt.ngay,'dd/mm/yyyy')

select btdbn.mabn, btdbn.hoten,icd.maicd,icd.chandoan,dm.ma as MaThuoc,dm.ten as tenthuoc,dm.hamluong,dm.dang,dm.dongia,sum(tt.soluong) as soluong,nhom.ten tennhom,tt.mabd as MaBDuoc, to_char(tt.ngay,'dd/mm/yyyy') ngay from medibvmmyy.d_tienthuoc tt, medibv.d_dmbd dm,medibv.btdbn btdbn,medibv.benhandt icd,medibv.d_dmnhom nhom where tt.mabd in (select id from medibv.d_dmbd where manhom in (select id from medibv.d_dmnhom where id not in (1,2))) and tt.mabd = dm.id and btdbn.mabn=tt.mabn and icd.mavaovien=tt.mavaovien and tt.maql=icd.maql and dm.manhom=nhom.id and tt.makp=5 group by btdbn.mabn, btdbn.hoten,icd.maicd,icd.chandoan,dm.ma,dm.ten,dm.hamluong,dm.dang,dm.dongia,nhom.ten,tt.mabd, to_char(tt.ngay,'dd/mm/yyyy')

select btdbn.mabn, btdbn.hoten,icd.maicd,icd.chandoan,dm.ma as MaThuoc,dm.ten as tenthuoc,dm.hamluong,dm.dang,dm.dongia,sum(tt.soluong) as soluong,nhom.ten tennhom,tt.mabd as MaBDuoc, to_char(tt.ngay,'dd/mm/yyyy') ngay from medibvmmyy.d_tienthuoc tt, medibv.d_dmbd dm,medibv.btdbn btdbn,medibv.benhandt icd,medibv.d_dmnhom nhom where tt.mabd in (select id from medibv.d_dmbd where manhom in (select id from medibv.d_dmnhom where id in (1))) and tt.mabd = dm.id and btdbn.mabn=tt.mabn and icd.mavaovien=tt.mavaovien and dm.manhom=nhom.id and tt.makp=3 group by btdbn.mabn, btdbn.hoten,icd.maicd,icd.chandoan,dm.ma,dm.ten,dm.hamluong,dm.dang,dm.dongia,nhom.ten,tt.mabd, to_char(tt.ngay,'dd/mm/yyyy')

select btdbn.mabn, btdbn.hoten,icd.maicd,icd.chandoan,dm.ma as MaThuoc,dm.ten as tenthuoc,dm.hamluong,dm.dang,dm.dongia,sum(tt.soluong) as soluong,nhom.ten tennhom,tt.mabd as MaBDuoc, to_char(tt.ngay,'dd/mm/yyyy') ngay from medibvmmyy.d_tienthuoc tt, medibv.d_dmbd dm,medibv.btdbn btdbn,medibv.benhandt icd,medibv.d_dmnhom nhom where tt.mabd in (select id from medibv.d_dmbd where manhom in (select id from medibv.d_dmnhom where id in (2))) and tt.mabd = dm.id and btdbn.mabn=tt.mabn and icd.mavaovien=tt.mavaovien and tt.maql=icd.maql and dm.manhom=nhom.id and tt.makp=3 group by btdbn.mabn, btdbn.hoten,icd.maicd,icd.chandoan,dm.ma,dm.ten,dm.hamluong,dm.dang,dm.dongia,nhom.ten,tt.mabd, to_char(tt.ngay,'dd/mm/yyyy')

select btdbn.mabn, btdbn.hoten,icd.maicd,icd.chandoan,dm.ma as MaThuoc,dm.ten as tenthuoc,dm.hamluong,dm.dang,dm.dongia,sum(tt.soluong) as soluong,nhom.ten tennhom,tt.mabd as MaBDuoc, to_char(tt.ngay,'dd/mm/yyyy') ngay from medibvmmyy.d_tienthuoc tt, medibv.d_dmbd dm,medibv.btdbn btdbn,medibv.benhandt icd,medibv.d_dmnhom nhom where tt.mabd in (select id from medibv.d_dmbd where manhom in (select id from medibv.d_dmnhom where id in (1))) and tt.mabd = dm.id and btdbn.mabn=tt.mabn and icd.mavaovien=tt.mavaovien and tt.maql=icd.maql and dm.manhom=nhom.id and tt.makp=8 group by btdbn.mabn, btdbn.hoten,icd.maicd,icd.chandoan,dm.ma,dm.ten,dm.hamluong,dm.dang,dm.dongia,nhom.ten,tt.mabd, to_char(tt.ngay,'dd/mm/yyyy')

select btdbn.mabn, btdbn.hoten,icd.maicd,icd.chandoan,dm.ma as MaThuoc,dm.ten as tenthuoc,dm.hamluong,dm.dang,dm.dongia,sum(tt.soluong) as soluong,nhom.ten tennhom,tt.mabd as MaBDuoc, to_char(tt.ngay,'dd/mm/yyyy') ngay from medibvmmyy.d_tienthuoc tt, medibv.d_dmbd dm,medibv.btdbn btdbn,medibv.benhandt icd,medibv.d_dmnhom nhom where tt.mabd in (select id from medibv.d_dmbd where manhom in (select id from medibv.d_dmnhom where id in (2))) and tt.mabd = dm.id and btdbn.mabn=tt.mabn and icd.mavaovien=tt.mavaovien and tt.maql=icd.maql and dm.manhom=nhom.id and tt.makp=4 group by btdbn.mabn, btdbn.hoten,icd.maicd,icd.chandoan,dm.ma,dm.ten,dm.hamluong,dm.dang,dm.dongia,nhom.ten,tt.mabd, to_char(tt.ngay,'dd/mm/yyyy')

select btdbn.mabn, btdbn.hoten,icd.maicd,icd.chandoan,dm.ma as MaThuoc,dm.ten as tenthuoc,dm.hamluong,dm.dang,dm.dongia,sum(tt.soluong) as soluong,nhom.ten tennhom,tt.mabd as MaBDuoc, to_char(tt.ngay,'dd/mm/yyyy') ngay from medibvmmyy.d_tienthuoc tt, medibv.d_dmbd dm,medibv.btdbn btdbn,medibv.benhandt icd,medibv.d_dmnhom nhom where to_date(to_char(tt.ngay,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy') between to_date(':v_tn','dd/mm/yyyy') and to_date(':v_dn','dd/mm/yyyy') and tt.mabd in (select id from medibv.d_dmbd where manhom in (select id from medibv.d_dmnhom where id in (2))) and tt.mabd = dm.id and btdbn.mabn=tt.mabn and icd.mavaovien=tt.mavaovien and tt.maql=icd.maql and dm.manhom=nhom.id and tt.makp=5 group by btdbn.mabn, btdbn.hoten,icd.maicd,icd.chandoan,dm.ma,dm.ten,dm.hamluong,dm.dang,dm.dongia,nhom.ten,tt.mabd, to_char(tt.ngay,'dd/mm/yyyy')
